p: The biological analysis of plants used in Saudi natural remedies showed the dominance of herb and subshrub forms with a percentage of 43% and 30% respectively. The shrub and tree were also reported with a low percentage of 6% and 21% respectively ( Table 2). These results were in agreement with earlier found data which reported that the most biological form of plants used in traditional medicine was subshrub, shrub, and herb ( Bourhia et al., 2019).
